resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81993</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81993</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4355</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Theory - Spreadsheets</string>
            <string language="es">Teoría – Hojas de cálculo</string>
            <string language="ga">Teoiric – Scarbhileoga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorie - Kalkulationstabellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Théorie - Tableurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teoria - Spreadsheets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoria - Fogli elettronici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεωρία - υπολογισμοί με λογιστικό φύλλο 
(spreadsheet)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource is for LCA students who are covering the Spreadsheet module. They will have to recall some details of the Spreadsheet application they used and then use these tools in this exercise.</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso es para los estudiantes del LCA que estén estudiando el módulo Hojas de cálculo. Tendrán que recordar algunos detalles de la aplicación de la hoja de cálculo que usaron y utilizar estas herramientas en este ejercicio.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an acmhainn seo do dhaltaí ATF a bhfuil an modúl Scarbhileoige a chlúdach acu. Beidh orthu smaoineadh ar roinnt sonraí maidir leis an bhfeidhm Scarbhileoige a d’úsáid siad agus ansin na huirlisí sa cheacht seo a úsáid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel ist für LCA Kursteilnehmer, 
die das Kalkulationstabelle Modul bedecken. Sie müssen einige 
Details der Kalkulationstabelle Anwendung erinnern an, die sie 
benutzten und dann diese Hilfsmittel in dieser Übung benutzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource est pour les étudiants de LCA 
qui couvrent le module de tableur. Ils devront rappeler quelques
détails de l'application de tableur qu'ils ont utilisé et puis 
utilisent ces outils dans cet exercice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso é para os estudantes de LCA que 
estão cobrindo o módulo do spreadsheet. Terão que recordar 
alguns detalhes da aplicação que do spreadsheet usaram e usam então
estas ferramentas neste exercício.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa è per gli allievi di LCA che 
stanno coprendo il modulo del foglio elettronico. Dovranno 
ricordare alcuni particolari dell'applicazione che del foglio 
elettronico hanno utilizzato ed allora che utilizzano questi strumenti
in questa esercitazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς είναι για τους 
σπουδαστές LCA που καλύπτουν την ενότητα υπολογισμών με 
λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet). Θα πρέπει να υπενθυμίσουν 
μερικές λεπτομέρειες της εφαρμογής υπολογισμών με λογιστικό 
φύλλο (spreadsheet) που χρησιμοποίησαν και χρησιμοποιούν έπειτα
αυτά τα εργαλεία σε αυτήν την άσκηση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
